1.title: Keep Coming Back
1.plot: Robin asks Kevin to be his sponsor; Nia reprises her role as a sex addict.

2.title: Back to School
2.plot: Kevin goes back to high school to get his degree. Trina and Wayne go on Lets Make a Deal.

3.title: Fifty Shades of Brown
3.plot: Kevin makes a make up deal. The guys compete to be the next James Bond. Boris is bald.

5.title: Nick and Kevin Are Wack
5.plot: Kevin and Nick have a rap war. Jackie and Bridgette go on game show called Spouse Smarts.

6.title: Hart in the Hood
6.plot: Kevin goes to live in the hood to get his mojo back.

7.title: Raising a Negro in the Sun
7.plot: Kevin the thespian trains for Broadway, Nelly owes his mentor - Luggy.

8.title: Everyday I'm Hustlin'
8.plot: Kevin tracks down his limited edition sneaker.

9.title: Hollywoodtooblack Part 1
9.plot: Kevin gets nominated for best actor.

10.title: Hollywoodtooblack Part 2
10.plot: The guys get nominated for Oscars for a slave movie and get caught up in the diversity controversy.

1.title: Easy Bake Kevin
1.plot: Kevin kicks Nick out of weekly poker after a "pie fight" and Nelly brings in replacement Robin Thicke...the husband of Kevin's crush, Paula Patton.

2.title: Thicke and Tired
2.plot: Nelly tries to mediate Kevin's one-sided beef with Robin, except Robin unwittingly outshines Kevin -- again. Meanwhile, JB and Boris discover Duane's new clothing factory has a rather dubious labor set-up.

3.title: It's Gettin' Hot In Herre
3.plot: In attempt to make more money, Kevin tries to get in on Nelly's investment of doing an exercise video - except Nelly's only asked the other guys to join.

4.title: Karma's a Mitch
4.plot: After flirting with boxer "Sugar" Shane Mosley's girlfriend, Kevin fakes an ailment to avoid getting clobbered by the champ during a charity fight.

5.title: Hart vs. Mosley
5.plot: After hitting on his girlfriend, Kevin fakes an ailment to avoid getting hit by Sugar Shane Mosley during a charity fight. Meanwhile, Duane has yet another investment scheme for the guys.

6.title: Auf Wiedersehen, Mitches
6.plot: Kevin attempts a music career and one of the other husbands is NOT amused. Duane's latest scheme causes Boris to run into an ex...and trouble.

7.title: Trick'd
7.plot: JB gets a hidden camera prank show, while Kevin gets some unexpected news - by a heartless friend with benefits.

8.title: Hollywood Scuffle
8.plot: Kevin writes a tell-all book about the guys and his ex-wife that doesn't completely tell the truth and the guys are NOT pleased.

9.title: Blackstabbers
9.plot: While Kevin's out of town, a mystery blackmailer taunts the guys to do outrageous tasks or he'll publicly release incriminating "boys night out" photos.

10.title: Retreat for Couples
10.plot: It's double date night for Boris and Duane with their respective wives, while Kevin has a double date night with a twist -- with twins -- that's interrupted by Nick Cannon.

11.title: The Reunion Special
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Fund Raising Hell
1.plot: In the Season 2 opener, Kevin shows off his upgraded celebrity digs to "OMG! Insider"'s Kevin Frazier while Wanda Sykes hijacks his new home for a star-studded fundraiser -- where Nick's ex, Selita Ebanks, catches Kevin's eye.

2.title: Hell of a Fundraiser
2.plot: Wanda's fundraiser at Kevin's house continues, as Nick's donated Smart Car is auctioned off by JB. Kevin, trying to impress Selita, starts a bidding war with Romany, only to have Khloe Kardashian up the ante with her bids.

3.title: Frauditions
3.plot: Kevin is feeling lonely and writes a fake movie with a kissing scene. His ex wife auditions for the part and it brings up old memories. When she finds out that the movie was fake and just to get "ass" she wasn't too happy.

4.title: Tisha & Duane
4.plot: Tisha and Duane are excited about their brand new sitcom for Nick's NCredible Network until the first joke to get cut is Duane. He is promptly replaced by Kevin -- who proceeds to wreak havoc with director Keenan Ivory Wayans.

5.title: Rock, Paper, Stealers
5.plot: Oliver tries his hand at stand-up, and Kevin tries to unnerve him by inviting his friend, Chris Rock, to Oliver's open mic debut.

6.title: Hook, Lie & Sink Her
6.plot: Still looking for high-wattage love, Kevin joins a celebrity online dating service.

7.title: Outdated
7.plot: With unsolicited help from Wayne Brady, Kevin tries to rekindle the flame with Selita on Wayne's talk show.

8.title: Doing the Bump
8.plot: New celebrity "it" couple, Kevin and Selita, are crowned "Kevlita" by the media -- and the buzz gets bigger when Selita reveals a baby bump.

9.title: Scattered Showers
9.plot: All hell breaks loose when Tisha and Nicole reluctantly join forces with Eva Marcille and Kevin's exes, Nadine Velasquez and Bridgette, to plan a promotional baby shower for Selita -- to be televised on Nick's Ncredible Network.

10.title: Storm Showers
10.plot: A red carpet kicks off Kevin and Selita's baby shower TV special with plenty of shameless promotions and behavior by the husbands and ladies.

11.title: The Bump Stops Here
11.plot: Duane arranges a Gymboree public appearance on Kevin and Selita's baby bump promotional tour, while Trina tries to get Kevin the ultimate worldwide platform: hosting the Oscars.

12.title: The Harter They Fall
12.plot: After the Kevlita baby bump debacle, Selita talks to Katie Couric to get her groove and image back. But when Kevin tries to get Shaun Robinson to redeem his name with an exclusive, no one's buying it.

13.title: Season 2 Reunion
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Falling Legend: Part 1
1.plot: George Lopez approaches Kevin about starring in a cop buddy flick, "47 1/2 Hours", and convinces him that the guys dropped him to save themselves.

2.title: Falling Legend: Part 2
2.plot: George Lopez asks Kevin to costar in a buddy-cop flick called "47 1/2 Hours," then tells him that the guys intentionally dropped him from the ledge.

3.title: No New Friends
3.plot: A furious Kevin brings a team of replacement "husbands" to the guys' pick-up game - but he gets served, literally, when they sue him for dropping out of their biopic, "Falling Legend."

4.title: Don't Vote for Nick
4.plot: Kevin's sabotages the political fundraiser that Kevin "promised" to host for Nick's mayoral campaign. But when Kevin's anti-Nick rant comes off as homophobic, the LGBT community dishes out revenge.

5.title: A Blurred 47 1/2 Hours
5.plot: Kevin and George start shooting "47 1/2 Hours," with director John Singleton threatening to replace the undirectable Kevin. While Regina Hall protests inappropriate on-screen sexual content.

6.title: Rolling with My Roomie
6.plot: After running Regina over on set, Kevin lets her sta in his pentouse while she is temporarily wheelchair-bound. Her demands drive him crazy - but a visit form her friend, Sanaa Lathan really drives him wild.

7.title: Bad Sport
7.plot: When Nelly and Bridgette start getting Kevin's son interested in baseball, Kevin tries to stop Nelly from "side-daddying" his son. Meanwhile, Duane revamps a reluctant Boris' message.

8.title: Black Is the Same Old Black
8.plot: Duane's shaky dealings with Boris' church were done in Tisha's name...so it's her name on the police warrant when cops arrive at her trunk show. But all of the wives get thrown in jail when they protest her arrest.

9.title: The Fight for Duane
9.plot: Tisha kicks Duane out after she gets out of jail, so Duane moves himself in...to Kevin's penthouse. Kevin's protests don't survive the hotty masseuses, butler and high-profile negotiations Duane is making.

10.title: Model Behavior
10.plot: Jackie forgets to pick up Kevin at the ariport, but it enables Kevin to be picked up by supermodel Jessica White, who draws Kevin into a wild night of partying, gambling, boxing and bungy jumping.

11.title: Vote for Kidney
11.plot: "Falling Legend" and "47-1/2 Hours" premiere on the same night -- at adjacent theaters -- and Kevin and Spoken Reasons battle as "dueling Kevins" until Nick appears to drop dead and an explosion shakes the theater.

12.title: One in a Bazillion
12.plot: At Boris' reputation-restoring celebrity event to feed the hungry, Kevin schemes to get out of donating his kidney to Nick by paying homeless people to test for matching.

1.title: Suck My Trick
1.plot: Kevin gets tricked into thinking that Nick dies when Kevin fails to donate his kidney to him. To offset the negative reaction, Kevin is guilted into making a 'big donation' to an organ donor organization.

2.title: When Kevin Met Salli
2.plot: Kevin runs into SALLI RICHARDSON and invites her to join the poker game with an ulterior motive. Instead, her cocky husband, DONDRE WHITFIELD, challenges Kevin to a joke-off. The prize: a permanent seat at the poker table.

3.title: Hart Medication
3.plot: Kevin inadvertantly takes drug-laden candies while in the company of an annoying acquaintance, Rapper, LIL TWEETZIE. Kevin ends up out of control at Nelly's event.

4.title: Hart Medication Part 2
4.plot: Kevin checks into the 'country club' Realizations Rehabilitation Center in Malibu for some court mandated therapy. Things go from bad to worse until Nia Long checks in to work on her own issues.

5.title: Cabin Pressure
5.plot: The guys embark on a much anticipated, annual pilgrimage to the NBA All Star Weekend. Despite a number of obstacles that threaten the good time-- travel snafus, crazed fans, Regina Hall, and Nadine.They manage to turn the flight into their own soul plane.

6.title: The Great American Zero
6.plot: Kevin's attempts to meet with Paramount President, DOUG HOWARD, to put his dream project into development for his next vehicle. Doug's assistant, is doing his best to keep Kevin off the lot.

7.title: Kevin Davis Jr.
7.plot: Kevin is initially offered the lead in a Sammy Davis, Jr. biopic, a role which he realizes could be his "Ray," or "Ali," and propel his career to new level.

8.title: Broad Talk
8.plot: Kevin decides to use one of his blind pilot commitments to do a 'chick chat' show. The only catch is that he insists that Charmange get one of the seats around the table. The other Real Husbands' wives and girlfriends must audition and complete for spots.

9.title: Bazillion Dollar Arm
9.plot: Duane gets Kevin to babysit his new client, Camilo Campaneris, a Cuban baseball pitching phenom. They partner in an attempt to get him a try-out with the Dodgers.

10.title: Don't Cross That Bridgette
10.plot: Kevin agrees to give his life-rights to Bridgette when she gets her own reality show.

11.title: Claire and Present Danger
11.plot: Kevin flirts with a 'cougar', who surprisingly returns his attention.

12.title: Easy as 1-2-3
12.plot: After Kevin's six-week poker winning streak, Arsenio Hall shows up with Craig Robinson-who had a role in sabotaging Kevin's pilot.

13.title: Walk of Shame
13.plot: Kevin and Nick compete for the last star on The Hollywood Walk of Fame.

14.title: Trina's Sister
14.plot: Trina's seductive baby sister, Kat Shaw, elicits the 'real' scoop on Nick for an article she's writing. When the article is printed, Nick goes to work to find out who fed Kat the story.

16.title: Episode #4.16
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.title: Real Husbands of Hollywood
plot: Kevin Hart and other celebrities play a comic fictionalized version of themselves in this parody of similarly named reality shows. Episodes often feature Kevin Hart's attempts to gain celebrity and his jealousy of his friends.::Anonymous
